issue.title: www.androidacy.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.androidacy.com/magisk-modules-repository/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.androidacy.com%2Fmagisk-modules-repository%2F) ### Comment > Effected filterlist: AdGuard Annoyances > Screenshot: One with AdGuard Annoyances, nothing happens. The otherwise, without AdGuard Annoyances, the intended screen to be seen. > > An **AdGuard Annoyances** filter prevents the scripted overlay from being seen/functioning on the following domain: https://www.androidacy.com/magisk-modules-repository/ > > Nothing happens when clicking either the download icon nor the book icon, while under normal circumstances clicking them would direct you to an overlay with additional information. The following filter prevents this functionality from working: > androidacy.com#$#.modal-open > div[role="dialog"][style*="display: block;"] { display: none !important; } > > Solution: For the moment, I have allowed, the filter locally through changing #$# to #@$#: > androidacy.com#@$#.modal-open > div[role="dialog"][style*="display: block;"] { display: none !important; } ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/ejQkOA7.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/isKyP0R.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- Platform: | uBlock Origin 1.48.4 Browser: | Firefox Filters: | Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

```adb
!+ PLATFORM(ext_ublock)
adguard.com,adguard.app##.test__block DIV[class*="app-ext"] DIV[class*="normal"]::after:style(content: " uBO")
```

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.etsy.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.etsy.com%2F) ### Comment Username: @lewisje > A variety of third-party DNS providers, along with the regular AdGuard DNS, return the correct IP addresses for Etsy, but AdGuard Family returns 94.140.14.35 as the IP address for www.etsy.com; that turns out to be the blocked-site page, which fails with a privacy error because the blocked-site page does not have a TLS certificate for etsy.com and that domain has HSTS (one of the bundled HSTS pins in recent browsers), so the TLS failure cannot be bypassed (I forgot to open the "Advanced" button when taking that screenshot, but that's basically what that message said). > > I fail to see how Etsy qualifies as "adult content" worthy of blocking via the family filter. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/3DYNmSv.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/kbinThc.png)

### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://www.androidacy.com/magisk-modules-repository/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.androidacy.com%2Fmagisk-modules-repository%2F) ### Comment > Effected filterlist: AdGuard Annoyances > Screenshot: One with AdGuard Annoyances, nothing happens. The otherwise, without AdGuard Annoyances, the intended screen to be seen. > > An **AdGuard Annoyances** filter prevents the scripted overlay from being seen/functioning on the following domain: https://www.androidacy.com/magisk-modules-repository/ > > Nothing happens when clicking either the download icon nor the book icon, while under normal circumstances clicking them would direct you to an overlay with additional information. The following filter prevents this functionality from working: > androidacy.com#$#.modal-open > div[role="dialog"][style*="display: block;"] { display: none !important; } > > Solution: For the moment, I have allowed, the filter locally through changing #$# to #@$#: > androidacy.com#@$#.modal-open > div[role="dialog"][style*="display: block;"] { display: none !important; } ### Screenshots

Solution from Polish Annoyance Filters:

```adb
!
! Scrollujące filmiki
||ppstatic.pl/js/floating-video/floatingVideo.js
||ppstatic.pl^*/article/sticky-video.js
||ppstatic.pl^*/article/top-sticky-video-mobile.js
||ppstatic.pl^*/plywajace_wideo.js
```

Maybe few made by AdamWr and deleted too fastly from AG Annoyances aka AG other widgets.

issue.title: Lomax.dk / Lomax.se - Broken (AdGuard Annoyances filter) [GDPR]

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

Other ad blocker

### AdGuard version

uBlock Origin v1.48.4

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.lomax.dk/
https://www.lomax.se/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

### Affected sites:
```
https://www.lomax.dk/
https://www.lomax.se/
```

### Issue:
Frozen pages / modal overlay / broken functions.

### Screenshot:
Not needed, as the problem is obvious.

### Problem filter:
* **AdGuard Annoyances filter**

### Problem rules:
```
~excellent-hemd.de,~excellent-hose.de,~engie-energie.nl###cookieModal
||policy*.cookieinformation.com^$third-party
```

### Note:
At first glance, only that cosmetic rule seems to cause issues.
However, several problems will occur, due to that network rule as well..
E.g. never-ending animations when adding items to the shopping basket, and nothing appears to happen when you try to remove items from the shopping basket.

### Possible fix:
```
- ~excellent-hemd.de,~excellent-hose.de,~engie-energie.nl###cookieModal
+ ~excellent-hemd.de,~excellent-hose.de,~engie-energie.nl,~lomax.dk,~lomax.se###cookieModal

- @@||policy.cookieinformation.com/uc.js$domain=jysk.nl
+ @@||policy.cookieinformation.com/uc.js$domain=jysk.nl|lomax.dk|lomax.se
```

### Temp fix:
```
lomax.dk,lomax.se#@##cookieModal
@@||policy.app.cookieinformation.com/uc.js$domain=lomax.dk|lomax.se
```

### Other problem filters:
* **I don't care about cookies** _(@kiboke)_
`policy.app.cookieinformation.com$domain=~kartor.eniro.se|~kart.gulesider.no|~kort.degulesider.dk|~map.krak.dk|~altibox.no|~babysam.dk|~elkjop.no|~minaftale.dk|~skousen.dk|~skousen.no|~whiteaway.com|~whiteaway.no|~whiteaway.se|~dvdoo.dk`

--

### System info:
* OS/version: Windows 10 Pro 22H2 (x64)
* Browser/version: LibreWolf v112.0-1 (x64) [Tracking Protection = Standard]
* Adblock Extension/version: uBlock Origin v1.48.4

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body: @THEtomaso thanks, I understand now. It will be fixed in IDCAC today.
